completeListOfAbilities.name: Crystal Power
completeListOfAbilities.desc:
Reduces all targets' BRV to 3/4
Group ranged BRV attack + group HP attack
Deals proportionate HP damage to each target
Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 150%
Moderately increased BRV damage when attacking single target
Moderately consumes HP upon use if Chelinka's Prayer not active

completeListOfAbilities.name: Crystal Power
completeListOfAbilities.desc:
Reduces all targets' BRV to 1/2
Group ranged BRV attack + group HP attack
Deals proportionate HP damage to each target
Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 150%
Moderately increased BRV damage when attacking single target
Moderately consumes HP upon use if Chelinka's Prayer not active

completeListOfAbilities.name: Rela Crystal
completeListOfAbilities.desc:
2-hit 聖 magic BRV attack
Self: 4 turns MAX BRV Up II、 Chelinka's Prayer
Consumes all BRV upon use if Chelinka's Prayer not already active
Triggers additional HP attack if BRV is at least 80% of MAX after last hit

ailments.name: Chelinka's Prayer
ailments.desc: Chelinka's Prayer: Restores HP、 BRV

ailments.name: MAX BRV Up
ailments.desc: MAX BRV Up: Raises MAX BRV

Consumes all BRV upon use if Chelinka's Prayer not already active
Triggers additional HP attack if BRV is at least 80% of MAX after last hit

completeListOfAbilities.name: Clavatian Sword
completeListOfAbilities.desc:
Reduces all enemies' BRV to 0 (excluding enemies afflicted with Break)
5-hit group 聖 ranged BRV attack + group HP attack
Moderately increased BRV damage when attacking single target
Deals total HP damage to each target
Grants allies BRV based on HP damage dealt
All targets: 6 turns 聖 Resist Down
Self: 2 turns special effect Crystal User – Two Halves
Crystal Power、 Rela Crystal use +1 after use (with upper limit)
While special effect Crystal User – Two Halves active:
 • Slightly raises party's ATK、 amount stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV
 • Grants ally HP Regen effect、 BRV based on individual MAX BRV at start of each allies' turn
 • (Does not stack with special effects of same name)

ailments.name: Two Crystal Halves
ailments.desc: Two Crystal Halves

ailments.name: PO Resist Down
ailments.desc: 聖 Resist Down: Lowers 聖 resist (does not stack)

passives.name: Crystal Power Extension
passives.desc:
When using Crystal Power:
 • Becomes group attack
 • Moderately increased BRV damage when attacking single target
 • Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 150%
 • Deals proportionate HP damage to each target
passives.short_desc: Crystal Power Extension: Boost to Crystal Power

passives.name: Chelinka's Prayer Attack
passives.desc: Moderately raises ATK while Chelinka's Prayer active
passives.short_desc: Chelinka's Prayer Attack: Raises ATK

passives.name: Rela Crystal Extension
passives.desc:
When using Rela Crystal:
 • Becomes 2-hit BRV attack with moderately increased cumulative BRV damage
 • Triggers additional HP attack if BRV is at least 80% of MAX at time of use
 • Granted effects' duration +2
passives.short_desc: Rela Crystal Extension: Boost to Rela Crystal

passive.name: Initial Boost Growth
passive.desc: Initial Boost use +1\n\nInitial Boost effect duration +2
passive.short_desc: Initial Boost Growth: Boost to Initial Boost

passive.name: Strength for Protection
passive.desc: Greater BRV reduction with Crystal Power\nIncreased BRV damage
passive.short_desc: Strength for Protection: Boost to Crystal Power

passive.name: Converging Twin Powers
passive.desc:
Rela Crystal use +1

When using Rela Crystal:
 • BRV damage boost
 • MAX BRV Up、 Chelinka's Prayer boost、 duration+

When using BRV Attack、 BRV Attack+:
 • BRV damage boost
passive.short_desc: Converging Twin Powers: Boost to Rela Crystal

passive.name: Ring of Fates
passive.desc: May equip EX ability Clavatian Sword
passive.short_desc: Ring of Fates: May equip Clavatian Sword

passives.name: Mighty Clavatian Sword
passives.desc: Slightly increases BRV damage dealt with Clavatian Sword
passives.short_desc: Mighty Clavatian Sword: Increases BRV damage dealt with Clavatian Sword

passives.name: Clavatian Sword Buff Longer
passives.desc: Crystal User – Two Halves duration +1
passives.short_desc: Clavatian Sword Buff Longer: Crystal User – Two Halves duration+

passives.name: Clavatian Sword Recast Up
passives.desc: Slightly raises recast speed of Clavatian Sword
passives.short_desc: Clavatian Sword Recast Up: Raises recast speed of Clavatian Sword

passive.name: Ring of Fates Extension
passive.desc: Boost to EX ability Clavatian Sword
passive.short_desc: Ring of Fates Extension: Boost to Clavatian Sword

passives.name: Clavatian Sword Force Advance+
passives.desc:
When using Clavatian Sword:
 • Tremendous BRV damage boost
 • Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%

While equipping EX+ weapon Defender (FFCC)+ or passive ability Ring of Fates Extension:
 • HP Attack becomes HP Attack+ (2-hit melee BRV attack + HP attack; stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%) while Chelinka's Prayer active
passives.short_desc: Clavatian Sword Force Advance+: Boost to Clavatian Sword; enables HP Attack+ while Chelinka's Prayer active

passives.name: Ring of Fates Extension Attack Boost Up
passives.desc: While equipping EX+ weapon Defender (FFCC)+ or passive ability Ring of Fates Extension:\n • Moderately raises MAX BRV、 ATK
passives.short_desc: Ring of Fates Extension Attack Boost Up: Raises MAX BRV、 ATK

passives.name: Rela Crystal Buff Starting
passives.desc: At start of quest:\n • Self: 6 turns MAX BRV Up III、 Chelinka's Prayer
passives.short_desc: Rela Crystal Buff Starting: MAX BRV Up III、 Chelinka's Prayer at start of quest

passives.name: Clavatian Sword Force Advance
passives.desc: When using Clavatian Sword:\n • Tremendous BRV damage boost\n • Slightly raises limit of BRV that may be stolen in excess of MAX BRV
passives.short_desc: Clavatian Sword Force Advance: Boost to Clavatian Sword
